billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

title: Repeals provisions mandating payroll deductions from public employees who engage in prohibited strikes
summary: Repeals provisions mandating a payroll deduction at twice the daily rate of pay for each day a public employee engages in an illegal strike.
actClause: AN ACT to repeal paragraph (f) of subdivision 2 of section 210 of the civil service law, relating to the prohibition of strikes by public employees and individual penalties
